|brand = EnGenius |model = EUB-862 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AG108 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Female Mini-B |formfactor = corded (modular) adapter
|vendor_id = 0cf3 |device_id = 0002 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = NI3-UB86005001 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:02:6F
|chip1 = Atheros;AR5523; |chip2 = Atheros;AR5112; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/25/2005 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 655216003002 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "NUB-862-1.00" and "701605460000" appears to be silkscreeened on the board in the FCC photos.
==Links of Interest== [https://deviwiki.com/files/datasheets/senao/NUB-862.pdf Datasheet]
==Notes== ===Transmit power (typical, FCC reg)=== *802.11a, 5.15-5.24 GHz, 6-54Mbps, 17 dBm *802.11a, 5.26-5.35 GHz, 6Mbps, 20 dBm *802.11a, 5.26-5.35 GHz, 54Mbps, 17 dBm *802.11a, 5.725-5.825 GHz, 6Mbps, 18 dBm *802.11a, 5.725-5.825 GHz, 54Mbps, 15 dBm *802.11b, 1-11Mbps, 22 dBm *802.11g, 6-24Mbps, 22 dBm *802.11g, 36Mbps, 21 dBm *802.11g, 48Mbps, 20 dBm *802.11g, 54Mbps, 19 dBm
===Transmit power (typical, ETSI reg)=== *802.11a, 5.15-5.35 GHz, 6Mbps, 20 dBm *802.11a, 5.15-5.35 GHz, 54Mbps, 17 dBm *802.11a, 5.47-5.725 GHz, 6Mbps, 19 dBm *802.11a, 5.47-5.725 GHz, 54Mbps, 16 dBm *802.11a, 5.725-5.825 GHz, 6Mbps, 18 dBm *802.11a, 5.725-5.825 GHz, 54Mbps, 15 dBm *802.11b, 1-11Mbps, 20 dBm *802.11g, 6-48Mbps, 20 dBm *802.11g, 54Mbps, 19 dBm
===Receiver sensitivity=== {{802dot11 RxSens|11a |6M=-89 |54M=-72 }} {{802dot11 RxSens|11b |1M=-96 |11M=-91 }} {{802dot11 RxSens|11g |6M=-91 |54M=-76 }}
===Full, from the datasheet=== *802.11a, 5.15-5.35 GHz, -90 dBm @ 6Mbps, -74 dBm @ 54Mbps *802.11a, 5.47-5.725 GHz, -90 dBm @ 6Mbps, -73 dBm @ 54Mbps *802.11a, 5.75-5.85 GHz, -89 dBm @ 6Mbps, -72 dBm @ 54Mbps *802.11b, -96 dBm @ 1Mbps, -91 dBm @ 11Mbps *802.11g, -91 dBm @ 6Mbps, -76 dBm @ 54Mbps
[[Category:English Documentation]]
